findings.description: Double CurrentDate() call in TZ not aligned with Architecture (single call). Carried over from CODE-001.
findings.recommendation: Align TZ 2.2.1 with Architecture 0.3 (single CurrentDate() call)

findings.description: TZ declares Status and Result as Resource, Architecture declares as Attribute. Architecture is correct: these are classifiers, not numeric metrics.
findings.recommendation: Align TZ 2.2.4 and 2.2.5 to Attribute (as in Architecture)

findings.description: Wording 'Labels are added programmatically in OnOpen' is inaccurate. Labels are created in extension configurator; only captions and colors are set programmatically.
findings.recommendation: Correct wording to 'Label captions are updated programmatically in OnOpen'

findings.section: TZ does not reference ИсторияМаршрутизации tabular part
findings.description: Architecture 1.3.2 defines tabular part ИсторияМаршрутизации (7 fields) for ЗаявкаНаСогласование, but TZ does not mention it. Not blocking: Architecture is authoritative for object structure.
findings.recommendation: Optionally add note in TZ 2.2.6 referencing Architecture 1.3.2
